ideas.title: Copy/Contrast Test
ideas.hypothesis: Providing a 30% discount will lead to better conversion and more billings
ideas.rationale: Building on the success of Poland and LATAM discounts, we can apply similar principles to Japan pricing test
instrumentation: track conversion rate by product tier

ideas.title: Discount Ladder Test
ideas.hypothesis: Offering a discount ladder (e.g., 10%, 20%, and 30%) will increase conversions
ideas.rationale: Discount ladders have been successful in other markets, and we can apply this strategy to Japan pricing test
risks: over-discounting may lead to decreased revenue
instrumentation: track conversion rate by discount tier

ideas.title: Price Anchoring Test
ideas.hypothesis: Providing a clear price anchor (e.g., 'Was $X, now $Y') will increase conversions
ideas.rationale: Price anchoring has been successful in other markets, and we can apply this strategy to Japan pricing test
instrumentation: track conversion rate by product tier
